abstract: Joe Jiampietro, one of the top internal deal-makers at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, is leaving the agency this month, the F.D.I.C. said.
snippet: Joe Jiampietro, one of the top internal deal-makers at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, is leaving the agency this month, the F.D.I.C. said.
lead_paragraph: Joe Jiampietro, one of the top internal dealmakers at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, is leaving the agency this month, the F.D.I.C. said.
